1371: Oudrauen was born in Breestraat in 1371.
1377: Lost sibling Nellen in 1377 when Nellen was 3.
1379: Lost mother at the age of 8.
Herbert took care of Oudrauen since Oudrauen was 9.
1382: Lost father at the age of 11.
Became caretaker of Kerstiaen, Dybben, Costan, Leanne, Agnes at age 12.
1390: Got married to Erkenradis at age 20 in 1390.
Oudrauen moved to Den Hof.C.6 after marriage.
1392: Had a son with Erkenradis, Ingel, at age 21.
1393: Had a daughter with Erkenradis, Badeloghen, at age 22.
1395: Lost his wife Erkenradis while she was giving birth to Ramont in 1395.
Became caretaker of Ingel, Badeloghen, Ramont at age 25.
1396: Got married a second time to Berta at age 26 in 1396.
Had Berta move in at Den Hof.C.6 after marriage.
1397: Had a son with Berta, Oudrauen, at age 26.
1399: Had a daughter with Berta, Siburgis, at age 28.
